articles.title: Philippine death toll from storm Nalgae rises to 98, disaster agency says - CNN
articles.description: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. is set on Monday to fly over flood-submerged districts to inspect the damage after Tropical Storm Nalgae barreled across the Southeast Asian country over the weekend, killing at least 98 people.
